Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class DevelopmentGridCardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.SubSceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.DevelopmentGridCardController
public class DevelopmentGridCardController extends SubSceneController
Represents a stack of cards in the development card grid.
